title: The Juice Hive
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Thai, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little smoothie and juice bar near the post office. Offers freshly pressed juices, smoothies, and food including tofu, a black bean burger, bowls, wraps, 3 varieties of zucchini noodles, daily soups (labeled if vegan), hummus that can be subbed in for any animal products. For breakfast the chia seed oatmeal (omit honey) and breakfast porridge (omit honey) both are made with almond milk. Has peanut butter and jelly wrap for the kids. A little supplement store is attached selling vegan protein supplements, organic beer and wine, and there's an aromatherapy table.
